control.description: Expanded Customize Programs Sub Menus Area

control.control: Script Path 720 50 font_26_B top 6 ff7C4849 ThemeColor ShadowColor left 10 700 search-focus.png button-nofocus.png false focus unfocus [UPPERCASE][COLOR=Grey]$LOCALIZE[573] -[/COLOR][/UPPERCASE] $INFO[Skin.String(ProgramsSubMenuBtn1-Scriptloc)] XBMC.RunScript(special://skin/scripts/HomeScripts.py,ProgramsSubMenuBtn1) Skin.SetString(ProgramsSubMenuBtn1Param,RunScript($INFO[Skin.String(ProgramsSubMenuBtn1Path)]))--> !Skin.String(ProgramsSubMenuBtn1-Favourite,FAVOURITE) + !Skin.String(ProgramsSubMenuBtn1-Plugin,PLUGIN) + Skin.String(ProgramsSubMenuBtn1-Script,SCRIPT)
